We are constantly improving and developing this application for one purpose: To serve you better. And, the best way for us to serve you, is to hear from you. Send us your ideas for features you would like to see (or fixes that need our attention) in future releases by clicking the button below.

string.name: upgrade_eligible_ph_nbr
string.b: Which phone number would you like to check for upgrade eligibility?

resources.string: Warning: Your contract has not expired yet, therefore you may be subject to an early termination fee if you switch carriers.
Good news! You\'re eligible for an early upgrade if you purchase an Android Phone.
Good News! You\'re eligible for an upgrade in 129 days!
This means you can upgrade to the very latest Android Phone right now, just for renewing your contract. If you\'d prefer a different phone, you can wait until you qualify for a full upgrade.
Eligibility dates are based upon the carrier\'s records. Message and Data rates may apply. See full terms and conditions. For info, text HELP to 22891.
Let us contact you when you\'re eligible for a full upgrade. How should we remind you?

1 Early upgrade eligibility entitles you to upgrade to an Android when you extend your current contract for an additional 2 year with your current carrier. A full upgrade entitles you to the best pricing on any new handset with your existing carrier when you extend your current contract.

2 Some restriction apply. Not available in all stores. Not available in Puerto Rico. Condition, documentation and accessories may affect value. Value subject to our physical inspection and evaluation. You are responsible for removing any data from your device before providing the product for evaluation. For complete details, go to Bestbuytradein.com, See a customer Service Specialist or visit the Geek Squad® Precinct within your local store. We reserve the right to refuse any trade-in for any reason.

Redeemable toward the purchase of any eligible product or service with a total purchase in excess of the amount of the certificate excluding tax, shipping and handling. 

The following items are considered non-qualifying redemptions for which reward certificates may not be redeemed: purchases at any Pacific Sales store-within-a-store, purchases/rentals at rent-to-own locations inside Best Buy stores, prior purchases, purchase of Best Buy or Magnolia Gift Cards, purchases made for resale, payment on any Best Buy Credit Card or Reward Zone program Credit Card, Miele appliances in AZ, CA, or NV, sales tax, jurisdictional fees, shipping charges, service charges, recycling fees and discounted Best Buy for Business or commercial purchases. Other exclusions may apply. 

To redeem reward certificates online at BestBuy.com, enter the certificate number at checkout, where indicated. 

To redeem reward certificates over the phone, simply give the Customer Service Representative your certificate number. 

Good at any participating Best Buy retail store or BestBuy.com. Not redeemable for cash, no change will be given back on redemption. Certificate valid until midnight (Central Time) on expiration date shown. No cash value. No cash refunds. Certificates will not be replaced if expired.
Please select the product categories that you would like to receive notifications for.
You must log into Reward Zone in order to receive Reward Zone notifications.
